Today in Caithness, it's looking solid with 6 ft @14s W swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Point of Ness and Murkle Point are your best bets, working well from 08:45 to 13:58. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 4 ft @8s ESE swell and fresh 38 mph SE winds, making it a poor day for surf.
